tweet: In case you guys are interesting in the formal model behind how Cardano handles smart contracts, here is our Extended UTXO model:  https://t.co/6UqjqGhIwC

RECAP time!  Last Saturday, we held the first official PoA meet-up in Nigeria. Attendees learned everything about stakepools, and how to launch one successfully.   Besides, during February we will be running MULTIPLE nodes from Nigeria to participate in the Cardano ITN.  https://t.co/3BZBK9nUiN

We wrote an article about #Cardano for those who haven't heard about it yet. We explain what a distributed network and #blockchain are, who is behind the project and what approach was chosen for development.  It may be useful for your friends:  https://t.co/Yq2cwWHl2b  #crypto

$ADA #CARDANO  This one looks similar to $EOS and ready to break a 6-month range.  Breaking above 535 satoshis -> targeting 645 satoshis.  On $USD pair; aiming for $0,065 if we continue this upwards trend.  https://t.co/QrmjRnwydS

If you missed it, watch Charles Hoskinson's keynote at Emerging Technologies Investor Meeting in @Davos @wef to share his insights about the latest industry trends in the global fintech ecosystem:  https://t.co/7t5MB8AsZp #Cardano #Davos2020 #fintech

Our WTSC paper “The Extended UTXO Model” introduces an extension to Bitcoin-style UTXO ledgers that significantly improves their expressive power. This is the basis for @InputOutputHK’s Plutus smart contracts for @Cardano:  https://t.co/qwnXHh1T5B
